content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the defendant had to pay various fees including stamp duty professional fees and court fees the case involves the division of matrimonial property and credit obligations the defendant and thirdparty creditors have raised objections to the applicants claims the applicant is seeking the dissolution of their marriage financial obligations to be recognized and maintenance for their children the court has received objections from third parties and will decide on the division of community property the court has allowed the dissolution of the marriage declared the applicant responsible for a consumer credit loan and ordered the fulfillment of personal obligations towards the state tax inspectorate the defendant must pay various fees to the state budget

metadata.cost: 109.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 372.72 EUR (professional fees) + 13.43 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant
